job.title: Senior Software Quality Engineer
job.description: an invitro diagnostic medical device organization who are scaling at a rapid rate are looking for a motivated senior software quality engineer to join their talented team on a remote basisltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtsenior software quality engineer responsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt establish endtoend automated tests using javascript selenium webdriver appium and other technologiesltligtltligt independently work through developing executing and reporting of vampampv plans and complex test protocolsltligtltligt work with team to create and execute an sdlc with automated traceabilityltligtltligt create detailed comprehensive test cases and plansltligtltligt execute manual system integration testsltligtltligt identify and thoroughly document bugsltligtltligt assure that our product matches or exceeds our patients and clinicians expectationsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtsenior software quality engineer skills and qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt bs in computer science or related discipline or equivalent work experienceltligtltligt years experience in the software quality industryltligtltligt years experience in medical devicesltligtltligt expertise in test methodologies writing test plans and cases and debuggingltligtltligt years exposure to automation testing frameworks and paradigmsltligtltligt prior experience developing or testing in compliance with recognized regulatory standards cfr part ltligtltligt demonstrable aptitude towards learning new technologiesltligtltulgt
